column4: hey all! hows going? uhm, i have a few questions! 1) which ftp client with fxp feature do u suggest? 2) u know... there was this app, with it u can add widgets like... whats the weaether in new york or something... 3) windows supports my monitor (its crappy one) - 1024x768 @ 85 Hz, but linux only @ 60 Hz, i know that i can reconfigure that.. uh xorg :) but can i edit it with hands? hm, guess thats all
thx, but that gkrellm ... no no no, maybe u know other? i used other one... :\ i remember it was @ repos too
